name: Unreal Tournament 2004
description: Native version (64bit) with game data from Steam
notes: The game needs to be launched at least once on Windows or Wine to get the CD-Key. The key can then be fetched from the registry in HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Unreal Technology\Installed Apps\UT2004\CDKey and copied in ~/.ut2004/System/cdkey
content:
files:
- utbin: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/ut2004/ut2004-x86_64.tar.gz
- data: $WINESTEAM:13230:/
game:
  exe: System/ut2004-bin
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: data
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/tmp/ut2004/
    file: utbin
    format: tgz
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/tmp/ut2004/
